readme: # OneDark easylanguage-syntax theme for Atom ## Grammar Processing and Syntax Highlighting Primary syntax highlight for [**Easylanguage**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EasyLanguage). Default for files with file-extension `*.eld`. Or press `ctrl+shift+l` and select easylanguage. Grammer Language Processing is separate project, because the source highlighting can be different by selected atom colorscheme. Install a grammar atom package [`raven2cz/atom-language-easylanguage`](https://github.com/raven2cz/atom-language-easylanguage) which contains ELD grammar. **See example of highlighting possibilities**
